Description:
Roles & Responsibility:We are seeking a highly motivated and experienced Asset Survey and Gathering Specialist to join our team. The ideal candidate will have a background in surveying, asset management, and data gathering. The main responsibilities of this role include but are not limited to:Gathering and managing data related to assets surveyed such as condition, maintenance history, and other necessary information.
Analyzing asset data to identify trends and make recommendations for future maintenance or upgrades.
Supporting asset management functions, including identifying assets that require attention and escalating any issues to the appropriate manager.
Collaborating with and supporting other departments such as planning, engineering, maintenance and operations.
Managing Facility CAFM software records and closing work ordersSkills
Skills:
Degree in Business Administrations, Management Information Systems, or a related field,
At least 2-4 years of relevant experience in asset surveying and data gathering.
Knowledge in CAFM software with data visualization and other asset management databases, systems, and software.
Excellent analytical, problem-solving, and decision-making skills.
An understanding of Health and Safety regulations and procedures.
